svg:

Relationships between Services / APIS- Kinds of APIs: - Open Host - This is meant a general purpose API. - It is designed for reuse. It is the "single point of truth" for it's "stuff" (bounded context)Relationship to an Open Host - If you are using an open host (you are calling it from your service) - This makes you a "conformist"- Customer / Supplier relationship.- Partnership- Shared Language - Identity / Auth - Outh2 / OIDC
